local_intent: Perceive red_plate, move above and align, lower until contact with retry, place with light press, open gripper, retreat
assumptions: White plate is securely held from the prior pick
Red plate pose 'red_plate_center' is available or can be detected
Workspace allows vertical lowering to make contact
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT transfer phase: DetectObject -> MoveAbove -> ApproachAndAlign -> LowerUntilContact (with retries) -> PlaceAt -> OpenGripper -> Retreat, using values consistent with the library and GLOBAL_BT.
